data.title: Solo & Ensemble Dates and Locations
data.meta_description: WSMA is now collecting information for 2024-2025 Concert and Solo & Ensemble Festivals.  One representative for each festival should submit scheduling information using the link below. Not sure if someone else submitted this form? View submitted 2024-2025 Festival Information. Scheduling FAQs and Resources
data.text:
WSMA does not allow festivals to be scheduled on the following dates:

State Marching Band Championships (Saturday, October 19, 2024)

Wisconsin State Music Conference (Wednesday, October 23 – Saturday, October 26, 2024)

Friday or Saturday of WSMA State Solo & Ensemble Festival weekends

Friday, April 25 – Saturday, April 26, 2025

Friday, May 2 – Saturday, May 3, 2025

Please note: There has been an increased request for Solo & Ensemble Festival dates on the last Saturday of February and the first two Saturdays of March. It is becoming increasingly difficult to assign qualified adjudicators to these festivals due to the large number of performance sites on these weekends.

WSMA understands that scheduling is complicated and is often contingent on facility availability and other extracurricular activities, but there are some options to consider that could alleviate judge assignment and scheduling concerns:
